name: Diego Leal
bio: Diego Leal is a consulting lead with 10+ years of experience guiding teams through growth, operational change, and data-informed decision making. He partners closely with executives and product leaders to translate goals into clear roadmaps and measurable outcomes.
services: Strategic planning and operating model design
Executive advisory and interim leadership support

projects.title: DCF Valuation Sandbox
projects.description: Interactive discounted cash flow modeling workspace for scenario analysis and sensitivity testing.

projects.title: Portfolio Optimizer
projects.description: Modern portfolio construction tool with risk constraints and efficient frontier insights.

projects.title: Risk Dashboard
projects.description: Consolidated market and exposure metrics with clear thresholds and alerting views.
